name: Tukoni
description:
Tukoni is a point-and-click puzzle adventure, based on a series of award-winning books by the Ukrainian artist Oksana Bula. Play as Tukoni, the forest spirits, as you meet unique characters, solve captivating puzzles, craft new items, and explore a magical world filled with kindness.

Explore the world
Explore the beautiful world hand-drawn by the Ukrainian artist Oksana Bula, and meet the characters inhabiting it!

Solve puzzles
Solve puzzles to help the forest animals, and to continue your journey!

The Traveller’s Notebook
Your notebook is your guide into the world of Tukoni. Check it often to see what’s next, and to find the cards that reflect your accomplished tasks.

Crafting
Combine items in your inventory to create unique new items that will help you in your adventure!

No reading
All the dialogs in the game are visualized through neat animated bubbles.
